title: activation for vista works with sp 1
description:
Activation for vista works with sp 1


needs a clean install to work !!!!
------------------------------------


Instructions how to install VistaLoader for clean installation of Vista SP1. *MUST FOLLOW EVERY SINGLE STEP WITHOUT MAKING ANY MISTAKE OR ELSE IT WON\&#039;T WORK*

1. *MUST* clean install Windows Vista SP1 using any of the serial below in order for this crack to work. 
   (I would recommend using a serial from the Manufacturer that build your system or your motherboard but even If the manufacturer for your system is not listed below,
    don\&#039;t worry, just use the serial from a manufacturer that you like below.    

2.  Once you have login to Vista after the installation have finished, extract VistaLoader.zip to \"C:\\VistaLoader\" 
    
3.  Run command prompt with administrator access. (Go to start menu and type command prompt in the search bar, command prompt should show up, just right click command prompt and click run as administrator) 

4.  Once you are in command prompt (DOS), you should see C:\\Windows\\System32> just type \"CD\\\" without quote and click enter, then type \"CD\\VistaLoader\" without quote and click enter.

5.  You should read C:\\VistaLoader> Once you see this just type \"install.cmd [oem]\" without quote and click enter. *replace [oem] with Asus, Hp, Acer, Lenovo, Sony or Dell.
    VERY IMPORTANT!!!! You MUST replace [oem] with the manufacturer that provided the serial you use for installing Vista SP1. 
    (eg. If you installed Vista SP1 using the serial from Dell, just type \"install.cmd dell\" without quote and click enter.)

6.  Reboot your system and you are activated!!
